Articles.Content:
Hello there,

to be honest, I have no idea what I shall write here.

Well.. I come from Germany, I am really interested in astronomy and astro physics, and (who guessed it) space engineering.

I played the early stages of Kerbal Space Program when the buyable version wasn't out. Then took a loooong break and I hear from somewhere that you coud buy Kerbal Space Program and then I bought it. (That was 2 days ago, by the way, heh).

Currently I have big problems with getting spaceships into orbit, either not enough fuel, or the rocket explodes on the launch pad, but I think I will figure it out soon.

Well, uh, Thats all folks!

~Greetings!

Hi snckrz, welcome to the community

I think you might be interested in this
